html:
11.13.23  10:06 pm   any suggestions on how to make an unfinished songs database?

     sure

     i keep forgetting about songs that i really wanted to come back to

     so just write them all down. the hardest part is naming and ordering. eventually you'll decide what method means the most to you. for me they are always sorted by date, so the names are not so important

11.13.23  9:48 pm   Caveman here, I hold a microphone next to the speaker of an electric keyboard every time I want to record music. I get the feeling that there's a more efficient way to record but the all midi apps I've tried either were too confusing or they produced something that sounded completely different to what I was playing. Do you have any suggestions, or should I keep doing what I was doing?

      what you're doing seems great. you actually skipped a concept in between midi and microphone, and that would be direct audio (recording the audio through a wire, but still recording the audio output and not the midi). in which case you'd get the exact sound of the keyboard, not just the 'midi notes'. but it turns out, if you do that, you might find it disappointing that you can't hear the air and sound of the room, and, most importantly, the tapping sounds of your hands on the keys. also besides all of that there's another advantage of the way you're doing it which is of course that you are doing it. the other ones are in fact not happening, so they are pretty useless anyway in that regard

11.13.23  9:45 pm   What's a punctuation mark you've always thought about using but just haven't gotten around to yet?

      as much time as i may have spent using punctuation symbols, i've actually spent even more time using them. so i've certainly used every individual punctuation symbol i've ever thought about using

11.13.23  9:18 pm   what do you think of the word "seltsam"?

      never heard of it

11.13.23  8:28 pm   what is "leaving the studio" supposed to represent you doing in more than a dream?

      a graphics test. or, more specifically, wandering out of the model (and admitting it), during a graphics test that's now actually been repurposed for a music video, with the admission kept in, for that honesty aesthetic

11.13.23  6:50 pm   hi bill. any tips on finishing songs? i have, no joke, over 3 whole albums worth of ideas, wether it be lyrics, chord progressions, melodies, structures, etc. but i've never actually written a full song. it's very frustrating because most of the ideas, in my opinion, are very good, but i just can't seem to find the motivation to actually focus and finish a song (writing lyrics in particular is very difficult for me). any tips to combat this? and have you ever been in this situation?

      in that case, i don't get what you mean by motivation. if you really didn't have it, then you never would have described the whole situation so clearly and made a focused point of inquiring about solutions for it. I can gladly give you a whole bunch of methods i use for the songwriting scenario you first described, but if you had no motivation then you of course wouldn't be motivated to hear it

11.13.23  6:11 pm   Do you use a Yamaha keyboard or a Korg for your songs?

If so, are you able to name the model

      the main selling point for the particular keyboard i use is that it's similar to all other keyboards. so naming the model seems like a step in the wrong direction

11.13.23  4:45 pm   Have you ever encountered something strange?

     sure

      If so describe it?

     if it's describable then it isn't strange

11.13.23  3:12 pm   i'm currently alternating between working a full-time job and being in university, both entirely unrelated to music. i have a fair amount of free time which i try to spend as much as possible on music. some days i feel like this situation is pretty good, but other days i feel like i am travelling down the completely wrong path, because i'm basically wasting enormous amounts of time on non-music. and when i look at all these professional musicians most of them went to music school instead of not-music school, and they got jobs related to music of course.

     that doesn't strike me as the most common scenario. in fact i can't necessarily even think of anyone who's done it quite like that

     and i'm scared that if i continue what i'm doing then i'm going to get "locked out" of the music world because i won't be good enough, or i won't know anybody, or something. what do i do??

      i wish you knew about all the people who are currently in some of today's highest ranks of success, whose backgrounds and lifestories are fully loaded with exactly these kinds of lost 'what the heck' sort of scenarios you just described. you are literally on the quintessential path to success -- specifically i'm talking about the part of your story where you're scared and don't know what the heck you're supposed to do. in fact i think that scene might actually be in every success movie

11.13.23  2:28 pm   If you made a new song to be your favourite, what would be your 2nd favourite?

      i'd prefer the one i'd plan to make next, to be my 2nd favorite, during the time i was working on the first one

11.13.23  2:15 pm   How is Waldo?

      great

11.13.23  1:15 pm   If the CEO of Blackrock could do a kickflip, would it make his business more ethical?

      it wouldn't move the needle

11.13.23  1:01 pm   how to not be awkward when targeted by overwhelming friendliness

      you'll get a little better each time

11.13.23  11:16 am   could you please explain the concept of keys? is it natural to stay in one key the way it's natural to stay in 4/4? what even is a key? i think i understood your bass explanation, but i'm not sure i get it completely. thanks

      i think if you go out and study 10 songs, you're going to make way way way more progress on this than anything i could put into words here

11.13.23  10:54 am   Do you have something against the interrobang‽ 

      i just have a sneaking suspicion that the entire point of the interrobang is to give you the opportunity to say the word 'interrobang', and then dazzle your friends by explaining what the interrobang is. there's nothing wrong with that, it's just that my friends are already dazzled because i already explained it to them earlier

11.13.23  10:33 am   I've always thought that "At the Airport Terminal" was one of your most emotional songs, but I've never been able to make heads or tails of the "porridge" line. Does it represent something? Or is there for the equally noble purpose of just sounding cool?

      i'll tell you exactly what happened. actually, i will show you all the other times i described it, and i think after reading them all, you'll understand the situation very clearly
     3.8.22 8:08 pm
     3.23.21 4:44 am
     2.17.21 7:40 am

     2.7.20 10:43 pm
     10.30.19 11:48 am

11.13.23  9:59 am   Have you ever gotten into an argument with someone via the questions page

      no

11.13.23  7:49 am   Are you aware that it snows in hell?

      i've never thought about it, but that seems logical

11.13.23  7:44 am   do you like tapeworms?

      no

11.13.23  6:07 am   can't the future just wait?

      sure. it always does

11.13.23  4:06 am   Are you secretly an alien pretending to be human?

      no

11.13.23  1:53 am   Around what date did you realize that vocal harmony should take priority over chordal instruments in describing the harmonic motion of a song and what circumstances led up to this realization?

      all i can tell you is the date that you described a realization that you've projected onto me

11.13.23  1:05 am   why cant i feel connected to anything or anyone

      maybe you are on another planet

11.13.23  12:38 am   Where do ducks get their quack?

      i thought i knew, until i started thinking about it

11.13.23  12:10 am   have you ever decided to abandon an idea and never revisit it?

     no

     if so, why?

11.12.23  11:52 pm   Will there be an interrobang in your next video‽

      absolutely not

11.12.23  10:14 pm   favorite thing you don't know the name of?

      cupcakes

11.12.23  9:06 pm   Is there any way to re appreciate smells like teen spirit, girl from Ipanema, and songs like that that are so powerful they are past the point of being heard for what they are. Does that makes sense. Also what are some other songs that are like this? Have a beautiful day

      a long gap of several years without hearing it, then hearing it again. can verify this was extremely effective for me with that particular nirvana recording. or if you are eager to get the results now, try speed+pitching it up or down by 10% or so. that may do the trick

11.12.23  9:04 pm   why isn't 'how to pull a rabbit out of a hat' on the expert mode page?

      for good luck, i'm just waiting until after i release the next one. this is standard procedure for me sometimes

11.12.23  8:34 pm   Do the lyrics at the end say:

Hello, Simon Says. Let me sign your checks.

      those are the lyrics at the end of one of my songs, but the punctuation is not included, nor clearly implied one way or another

11.12.23  7:48 pm   How do i make my car longer in length? There's never enough room for my legs

      you might have to make a new car

11.12.23  7:17 pm   how many more times did it take for you to figure out your sound?

      i figure it out a little bit every time

11.12.23  5:39 pm   bill, i have all week off of work. i've already located a mountain i intend to climb. what else should i do? 

      how about locating some more mountains you intend to climb. just to stay ahead of things

11.12.23  4:56 pm   Will you mow my lawn while I'm on vacation?

      no i won't. i'm sorry about that

11.12.23  4:05 pm   what is your favorite brand of macaroni and cheese 

      i've only heard of one brand. i have to assume it's the best just because of how complicated it would be for me to mentally process the implications of a scenario other than that

11.12.23  3:33 pm   South Dakota or North Dakota?

      check your latitude. if it's above about 46 then it's probably north dakota

11.12.23  3:27 pm   How to come up with something that's intentionally bad?

      that's technically impossible

11.12.23  2:37 pm   Why does nothing make sense?

      you might be looking at it from an impossible angle

11.12.23  2:12 pm   What is the meaning of enchiladas?

      it's meant to be a cure for indecision. just have everything

11.12.23  12:11 pm   how do i escape my dream?

      you wake up

11.12.23  11:53 am   why does the Dunning-Kruger effect exist?

      it's a conversation starter

11.12.23  11:52 am   do you have any advice for someone trying to learn guitar

      only if they tell me what they seem to be having trouble with, if anything

11.12.23  11:37 am   what do you think happens at mile 305 of the highway

      the cars there will swiftly move to mile 306, or 304. if there are no cars there, then, alien picnics i suppose

11.12.23  8:02 am   i'm drowning in my own brain and for the first time in a while it's fucking awesome but i can't keep up.   speaking aloud snaps me out of it. i'd have to learn to be a court interpreter with silent equipment and stay in the zone and just.  be there.  i can't move i can't think i have to be there.     but i can't be there and show the right emphasis.  just need to record my brain.  this is like cuneiform 

      you're gonna be fine. let me know if you need anything else

11.12.23  6:22 am   Do you think artists can ever be satisfied with their works?

      for fleeting moments

11.12.23  3:56 am   what do you think about feelings and why do you feel them?

      it will take my whole lifetime to describe. as you can see i've had to sometimes resort to abstract tactics now and again, such as music and more

11.12.23  1:54 am   how would you define an electron

      i feel like i'd have to go to the ends of the universe first

11.12.23  1:51 am   Why is it taking me so long to write this song?

      at this point, it's taking you so long because it's already taken you so long. the longer it takes, the longer it takes. on the other hand, the shorter it takes, the shorter it takes

11.12.23  1:29 am   in out to lunch, was the flip onto the light fixture in fact the trick they wanted to see if they can, or was it an unintended consequence?

     that was not the trick. the trick would be to do more juggling tricks and continue juggling

     if it wasn't the intended trick, what trick was the person going for?

     maybe mills mess, who knows

11.12.23  1:16 am   How do you feel about interaction for the sake of interaction?

      fine
